trans-unit.source: Interface definition for creating and deleting Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: Interface definition para criação e exclusão de raízes virtuais do serviços de informações da Internet (IIS) 6.0.

trans-unit.source: The IComSoapIISVRoot interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: A interface IComSoapIISVRoot define métodos para criação e exclusão de raízes virtuais do IIS 6.0.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface é implementada somente pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>classe e é usado apenas com a infraestrutura .NET Framework durante a criação de uma habilitado para SOAP COM+ raiz virtual do aplicativo.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>

trans-unit.source: IComSoapIISVRoot does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot não precisam ser implementados diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>de classe que implementa o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>interface que contém o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>e <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>métodos.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>não totalmente é implementada pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: IComSoapIISVRoot is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot é usado internamente pelo .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa usá-lo diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma raiz virtual do Internet Information Services (IIS).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>interface não precisam ser implementados diretamente no seu código.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface (implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class), which exposes a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>interface (implementado pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe), que expõe um <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>método.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de Web raiz.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to `PhysicalPath` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: O caminho físico da raiz virtual, que corresponde à `PhysicalPath` do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>método.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to `VirtualRoot` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: O nome da raiz virtual, que corresponde à `VirtualRoot` do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>método.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres no qual uma mensagem de erro pode ser gravada.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Exclui uma raiz virtual do Internet Information Services (IIS).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>interface não precisam ser implementados diretamente no seu código.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface (implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class), exposes a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>interface (implementado pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe), expõe um <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>método.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>

trans-unit.source: However, that method is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, esse método não é totalmente implementado pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de Web raiz.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: O caminho físico da raiz virtual.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: O nome da raiz virtual.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres no qual uma mensagem de erro pode ser gravada.
